mods:mods.mods:abstract: Image consists of one square, white, metal button. At the top right is an image of a dove with a branch in its beak. Below the image to the left is the YWCA logo and text reads:"YWCA Week without Violence". Below text is a stylized "M" beside text which reads:"The Mutual Group". On the left side of button in a vertical line black texts reads:"October 19-25, 1997".
